column5: OPK Ticker symbol should be TARP OPKO is Dr Frosts own longrunning toxic asset relief program

OPK Itll be interesting to see how many more hurdles Dr Frost can himself setup for OPKO to stumble through from now until the end of the year when they announce top line results for hghctp Shares of OPK arent even close to finding a bottom yet Sorry not sorry The CEO is garbage The company is a holding company for toxic healthcare assets Theres not a worse stock trading on the NASDAQ for a reason

OPK Frost continues to buy shares here so must be a positive sign ignore the 10yr stock chart of declines and new lows and just follow that there Millionaire as he buys more shares oh yeah he used to be a Billionaire several times over but then he got greedy and involved in Slopko for a beat down worthy of the worst

OPK Extremely overvalued The company has a long history of using insider buying to keep trade volumes up OPKO never intended for their products to have commercial success Its a long running pumpndump nothing but a holding company Dr Frost created to dispose of toxic healthcare assets to neatly package up for Ch 11 bankruptcy protection The equity is worthless
